name: Disparti Law Group, P.A.
tag_list: personal-injury, car-accidents, motorcycle-accidents, railroad-disability-and-injury, truck-accidents, wrongful-death, vaccine-injury, short-term-disability, social-security-disability, supplemental-security-income
overview:
The Disparti Law Group, P.A., is a law firm that is dedicated to providing legal representation for individuals who have been injured or are unable to work. Using our more than 30 years of experience and skill, it is our mission to obtain results for accident victims and their family members in Tampa and across South Florida.

We represent victims in a wide variety of practice areas, including Social Security Disability, Supplemental Security Income claims, Railroad Disability, TSGLI benefits and Personal Injury actions, such as auto accidents, wrongful death, tort, serious personal injuries and insurance disputes.

Our goal is to utilize our experience, skill and dedication to obtain the best possible outcome for each of our clients. We accomplish this goal by using a team approach of knowledgeable attorneys and a support staff that is dedicated to our clients. We believe that it is better to have more than one legal mind working on your case—in essence you are not just hiring an attorney, but you are hiring an entire law group.
